entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:05 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 6:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
